item.title: Google's $2 Billion Anthropic Investment Gets U.K. Antitrust Clearance
item.description: The Competition and Markets Authority said it wouldn’t open an in-depth investigation into Google’s investment in the AI startup.

item.title: Biden Team Races to Deliver Chip Grants Before Trump Takes Over
